thread.title: Russian Billionaire Looks to Swap Social Media for Socializing (With Aliens)
thread.title_full: Russian Billionaire Looks to Swap Social Media for Socializing (With Aliens) - WSJ

author: Danny Yadron
title: Russian Billionaire Looks to Swap Social Media for Socializing (With Aliens)
text:
LAGUNA BEACH, Calif.—If Russian billionaire Yuri Milner’s $100 million effort to find aliens succeeds, will he talk back to the extraterrestrial life on behalf of mankind?
“There is a lot of responsibility to make this decision,” Mr. Milner said Wednesday on stage at WSJD Live, The Wall Street Journal’s tech conference.
“This will be a...
